input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product specification.

Product specification:
Stero Dishwasher P56-1684 22-5/8"X17" Curtain 

Product keywords:
Genuine OEM replacement part
Stero was founded over 60-years ago in the restaurant mecca of San Francisco and manufactures dishwashers that get the job done
Use genuine OEM parts for safety reliability and performance

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Stero Dishwasher P56-1684 Curtain is a genuine OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) part that fits various models of Stero dishwashers. It is made of durable and reliable plastic material that resists corrosion and ensures long-lasting use. The curtain measures 22-5/8" x 17" and is easy to install. It is an important part of the dishwasher that helps to keep the water inside and prevents it from leaking out. Use genuine OEM parts for safety, reliability, and performance. Stero was founded over 60-years ago in the restaurant mecca of San Francisco and manufactures dishwashers that can meet the demanding needs of any commercial kitchen.
input_text.Response B: Stero is a San Francisco based company that has been manufacturing dishwashers for over 60-years.  Genuine OEM replacement parts ensure safety, reliability, and performance.  Use only genuine Stero parts for your dishwasher.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
